BEFORE:
o = x
        for block in self.res_blocks:
            res = o
            o = block(o * x_mask if x_mask is not None else o)
AFTER:
o = x * x_mask
        for block in self.res_blocks:
            res = o
            o = block(o)
            o = o + res
            if x_mask is not None:
                o = o * x_mask
        return o
